name: Battlecruiser interior
description:
This is something I made during the sc2 beta in preparation for a campaign I was planning. It's the innards of a battlecruiser, intended to be sort of a 'hub' map from which other missions would be launched. Due to the realization upon sc2 release that it's basically an in-game version of how the campaign Hyperion functioned, I abandoned it for other endeavors.

I've been contemplating getting back into the mapping scene though and I thought a good start would be to share some of the shelved stuff I had done, if only for demonstration, inspiration or asset sharing purposes. Feel free to use this in projects, although credit would be appreciated. Because it was made during beta, the doodad palette was pretty limited and may need sprucing up.

Enjoy!
author: _ForgeUser4347922
